game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Explore the ancient ruins and retrieve the legendary artifact.
game.description: Legend has it that deep within the jungle lies a lost city, hidden away for centuries. The city is said to contain an ancient artifact of great power and value. Many have attempted to find the city before, but none have returned. You are tasked with finding the lost city and retrieving the artifact.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting +5 intelligence

tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city from local villagers.
tasks.description: Travel to the nearby village and speak with the locals. They may have heard rumors or stories about the lost city that could aid you in your quest.

tasks.objective: Explore the jungle and search for signs of the lost city.
tasks.description: Venture into the dense jungle, searching for any signs of the lost city. Be wary of deadly creatures and treacherous terrain.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the heart of the lost city.
tasks.description: Once you have found the lost city, navigate its ancient ruins and retrieve the legendary artifact. Be prepared to face traps and puzzles that guard the artifact.
